tournament.motion: THP a world where discourse surrounding conflict was focused more on collateral damage than conflict resolution (Eg: Focusing more on humanitarian aid than a single/two state solution in Gaza)
This House prefers narratives of affirmation (praising/celebrating the good) to narratives of punishment (shaming/condemning the bad)

THS the trend of hosting domestic league games overseas

Currently there is an increasing trend among football leagues with saturated markets ( Eg: Spain's La Liga and Italy's Serie A) to host games overseas. (Eg: Hosting the Super Cup Final in Riyadh, big games between Barcelona and Real Madrid or Inter Milan vs Napoli being held in the United States)

THP a world where Hollywood adopts the strategy of A24 studios

A24 studios is known for giving filmmakers significant creative freedom, allowing them to pursue unique visions and artistic styles. A24 prioritizes working with directors who have a strong, unique voice and allows them to execute their creative vision with minimal interference. 

A24s’ strategy of lower-budget films allows them to take on more risks that more established Hollywood studios might be inclined to shun, knowing that a few commercial hits can offset potential losses.

TH as Harvey would keep the secret

You are 25 year old Harvey Specter. You and your brother have found out that your mother is having an affair. Your mother is pleading for you and your brother to keep this a secret and is making a promise that she would never have an affair again. Your brother is adamant about wanting to keep this a secret.

TH as the Debaters’ Council of Sri Lanka, would implement the Mandatory Adjudicator Fee Policy instead of the Institutional Adjudicator Policy

The Sri Lanka Schools Debating Circuit is currently facing a growing shortage of qualified judges willing to adjudicate at debating tournaments (e.g., Vijis’23, Vijis’24, and Vijis’25). To address this issue, the Debaters’ Council of Sri Lanka currently enforces an Institutional Adjudicator Policy. Under this policy, every institution must register adjudicators to judge a minimum of three rounds per team participating, with additional judges sourced through the personal networks of the Organizing Committee (e.g., Adam Dhilshan adjudicating five rounds at Vijis).

Under a Mandatory Adjudicator Fee Policy, however, teams would be exempt from providing institutional adjudicators. Instead, for every tournament, each team would be required to pay a mandatory fee, which the Organizing Committee would then use to provide monetary compensation to adjudicators who are willing to judge.

THBT development agencies ( DFAT,DFID,USAID) should focus on pushing development through non-government organisations (NGOs, Cooperatives, Societies) rather than the government.

USAID (US), DFAT (Australia) and DFID (UK) are the major aid agencies of developed countries. The aim of an aid agency is to design, fund, and deliver assistance that improves the welfare and development of people in other countries, especially those facing poverty, conflict, or natural disasters.

TH as Tharani would choose to be a memorable player in a popular sport

You are Tharani. Before you are born you are given a choice. You can either choose to be memorable in a highly popular sport (Moeen Ali in cricket,  Angel di Maria in football) or you can choose to be considered as the undisputed Greatest Of All Time in a less popular sport (Magnus Carlsen in chess, Lin Dan in badminton, Shalem Sumanthiran in SL debating). 


You will not be aware that you made this choice after you are born.
